title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Scientific Learning for Improving Cognitive Abilities in the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment procedures reflecting cognitive processing characteristics of older adults with 80%+ accuracy via VR simulations.
Learners can apply cognitive strategies (e.g., chunking, visual organization) to enhance information processing efficiency in real-world science problem-solving.
Learners can design and present senior-friendly experiment guidelines by applying scientific knowledge acquired in team-based projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
